data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module hierarchy is being developed as the basis for an
    automated abuse management system at a large ISP.

    Its included toolset can detect a growing number of complaint
    types, allowing an automated process to sort the information, open
    tickets automatically and generally acting quickly in responding to
    AUP abuse incidents.

    The author feels that publishing this hierarchy of modules might
    spur interest in creating a standard format for abuse complaints.
